complete.header: Enter the token received in your password reset email.

errors.missing-code: You need to enter the password reset code that was emailed.
errors.missing-password: You need to enter a new password.
errors.invalid-code: The code you used was wrong. Please try sending another email.
errors.code-already-used: The link from your email has already been used. Try sending another.

new.title: Forgot your password?
new.header: Enter the email you signed up with and an email with instructions will be sent to you.

errors.missing-email: You need to enter an email.

error-list.generic-error: An unknown error has occured. Are you offline?

events.status-change: You moved this commission from {{old}} to {{new}}.

help-card.title: What are these?
help-card.text-1: You can set up multiple question-and-answer forms for customers to fill out.
help-card.text-2: When a customer fills a form out from the link you send them, a commission will automatically be created.

item.last-submitted-at: This form was last filled out
item.last-submitted-at-never: So far, no customers have filled this form out.

feature-not-built: This feature has not been built yet.
